info.name: I love Free Software, black

description.p: The tshirt shows "I love Free Software" on the front and some small hearts and "fsfe.org" on the back.

info.name: Free Software Free Society and GNU, blue

description.p: The tshirt shows the "Free Software Free Society" slogan on the front with www.fsfe.org and the GNU head on the back, made with tiny FSFE logos.

info.name: Free Software Free Society and GNU, orange

description.p: The tshirt shows the "Free Software Free Society" slogan on the front with www.fsfe.org and the GNU head on the back, made with tiny FSFE logos.

info.name: Free Software Free Society and GNU, red

description.p: The tshirt shows the "Free Software Free Society" slogan on the front with www.fsfe.org and the GNU head on the back, made with tiny FSFE logos.

info.name: Free Software Free Society and GNU, red

description.p: Same than above, but a shirt with long sleeves

info.name: Free Software Free Society and GNU, yellow/green

description.p: The tshirt shows the "Free Software Free Society" slogan on the front with www.fsfe.org and the GNU head on the back, made with tiny FSFE logos.

info.name: Mach Dich Frei, green

description.p: The tshirt shows the Fellowship logo and the German text "Mach Dich Frei!" on the front and the URL of the Fellowship page (fsfe.org) with included FSFE logo on the back.

info.name: Free Software Free Society Hooded, black

description.p: The hooded shirt shows a small Fellowship logo on the front and the text "Free Software Free Society" on the back.

info.name: Hacking for Freedom, black

description.p: The shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Hacking for Freedom" on the front and the URL "www.fsfe.org" on the back.

info.name: I am a fork Baby romper, green

description.p: There is no text on the back side. The sizes are refering to the months of age.

info.name: (Plussy) = fork() Baby romper, blue/red

description.p: There is no text on the back side. The sizes are refering to the months of age.

info.name: Free Software Free Society Hooded, with zip, black

description.p: The hooded shirt shows a small Fellowship logo on the front and the text "Free Software Free Society" on the back.

info.name: Free Software Free Society Hooded, grey

description.p: The hooded shirt shows a small Fellowship logo on the front and the text "Free Software Free Society" on the back.

info.name: Free Software Free Society Zipped Hooded, grey

description.p: The zipped hooded shirt shows a small Fellowship logo on the front and the text "Free Software Free Society" on the back.

info.name: Fellowship cufflinks

description.p: Price per pair, including a nice box

info.name: Gnu pin

description.p: A pin with the Gnu. The text around: "Free Software Foundation Europe"

info.name: GNU pin, gold-colored, american version

description.p: A pin with the Gnu. The text around: "Free Software Foundation established 1985"

info.name: Gnu pin

description.p: Same pin, but with magnet.

info.name: Gnu cufflinks

description.p: Price per pair, including a nice box

info.name: Analog printer, geek-style pen, green

description.p: This analog printer is interoperable and works on every platforms. Highly hackable, it uses open standards.

info.name: Analog printer, business-style pen, dark blue

description.p: This analog printer is interoperable and works on every platforms. Highly hackable, it uses open standards and comes with a shiny box.
